article.para: This is the README for the Ant Task distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter. This Plug-in provides the integration with the wonderful Jakarta build tool.
This is the README for the Console application distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter. This Plug-in provides a powerful command line interface for Jalopy.
This is the README for the Eclipse Plug-in distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter.
This is the README for the JBuilder OpenTool distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter.
This is the README for the JDeveloper Extension distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter.
This is the README for the jEdit Plug-in distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter.

This is the README for the core runtime distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter. This distribution only contains the Jalopy core classes and is therefore only suited for those who want to integrate Jalopy with their custom applications or develop a new Plug-in.
This is the README for the NetBeans/Sun ONE Studio module distribution of the Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter.

sect1.title: Distribution libraries
sect1.para: This distribution contains the following libraries:

itemizedlist.listitem: A modified and re-packaged ANTLR Parser Generator runtime 2.7.2a2 (bundled with the Jalopy runtime)
Jalopy Java Source Code Formatter runtime (jalopy-1.0b9.jar)
JAXP Java API for XML Processing (jaxp-1.2.jar)
